p: Of the seven papers that reported data on influenza in patients with PTB (Table 2), 26, 28, 30, 31, 32, 33, 36 four were from tuberculosis HBCs and the other three were from Europe in a period with high tuberculosis prevalence. 30, 31, 32, 33 Four of these papers were reported by the authors as analytical studies, 30, 31, 32, 36 and a fifth 28 had data suitable for authors of this manuscript to review analytically.
